title.rendered: Stetson Jorgensen: Net Worth 2023, Career Earnings, Wife

content.rendered:
Summary

  • About Stetson Jorgensen
    • Early Life
    • Early Career
    • Professional Career
  • Stetson Jorgensen’s Net Worth
    • Career Earnings
    • Salary
    • Endorsements
  • Personal Details About Stetson Jorgensen
    • Wife
    • Age
    • Height and Weight
    • Career Stats
    • FAQs About Stetson Jorgensen
  • Conclusion

Stetson Jorgensen, a talented and determined cowboy from Idaho, has made a name for himself in the world of rodeo.

With multiple appearances at the Wrangler National Finals Rodeo (NFR) and impressive career earnings, Jorgensen has become a force to be reckoned with in the steer wrestling arena.

This article takes a closer look at the life and career of Stetson Jorgensen, from his early beginnings to his current success in the professional rodeo circuit.

About Stetson Jorgensen

Stetson Jorgensen was born and raised in Blackfoot, Idaho. He joined the Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association (PRCA) in 2015.

Jorgensen has qualified for the Wrangler National Finals Rodeo four times, consistently challenging for a gold buckle during his trips to the Thomas & Mack Center in Las Vegas.

Early Life

Growing up in Blackfoot, Idaho, rodeo has always been a part of Jorgensen’s life. He rode his first sheep at the age of one. In high school, he got into steer wrestling thanks to some of his friends who were also involved in it.

However, he faced several injuries during his high school career, including a broken femur and wrist.

Early Career

Jorgensen attended Central Wyoming College, where he met his friend Colton Hill. It was during this time that he began to focus on steer wrestling.

He won four out of the last five rodeos of the spring season and took home the year-end regional title. After his freshman year, he bought his permit and traveled the circuit on and off for a few years before his professional career took off.

Professional Career

Stetson Jorgensen turned pro in 2015. He made his first NFR appearance in 2019, placing in four rounds and finishing third in the world with $197,246 in earnings.

In 2022, he finished sixth in the world standings with over $235,000 in season earnings. As of 2023, Jorgensen is working towards qualifying for the NFR for the fifth straight season.

Stetson Jorgensen’s Net Worth

Stetson Jorgensen’s net worth is estimated at $1 million in 2023. While it is known that he had a successful season in 2022, earning over $235,000, and he continues to compete in 2023, the exact figures for his earnings or net worth in 2023 are not available.

Career Earnings

Salary

The exact salary details of Stetson Jorgensen are not publicly available. However, his earnings from various rodeo events can provide insight into his income.

In 2022, his regular season earnings were reported to be $134,660. He also earned $107,026 at the Wrangler NFR. After a round win for Night 3, his total earnings were reported to be $213,680.

By the end of 2022, Jorgensen had earned $235,287, surpassing his previous single-season high by about $37,000.

Endorsements

Stetson Jorgensen is sponsored by AH Performance Stall Mats. This company provides all the stall mats he needs while traveling, ensuring the comfort of his main mount, Mable.

Personal Details About Stetson Jorgensen

Wife

Stetson Jorgensen is engaged to Kellie Collier, a barrel racer. The couple is set to get married on May 19, 2023, in Rigby, Idaho. They met in a rather unique way when Kellie liked a picture of Stetson on Facebook.

This led to them getting to know each other and eventually becoming a couple. They have a pact to not go longer than 5-6 weeks without seeing each other, despite their busy rodeo schedules.

Stetson proposed to Kellie in June 2022, and she said yes. Kellie has expressed her love and support for Stetson on social media, referring to him as the love of her life.

Age

As of October 23, 2023, Stetson Jorgensen is 29 years old.

Height and Weight

Stetson Jorgensen stands 6 feet 1 inch tall (185 cm) and weighs 220 pounds (100 kg).

Career Stats

FAQs About Stetson Jorgensen

Where is Stetson Jorgensen from?

Stetson Jorgensen is from Blackfoot, Idaho.

How tall is Stetson Jorgensen?

Stetson Jorgensen is 6 feet 1 inch tall (185 cm).

How many times has Stetson Jorgensen qualified for the NFR?

Stetson Jorgensen has qualified for the NFR four times.

What is Stetson Jorgensen’s main event in rodeo?

Stetson Jorgensen competes in steer wrestling.

Is Stetson Jorgensen married?

Stetson Jorgensen is engaged to Kellie Collier, a 2016 National Finals Rodeo Barrel Racing qualifier.

Conclusion

Stetson Jorgensen’s journey in the world of rodeo is a testament to his talent, determination, and passion for the sport. With multiple NFR appearances and impressive career earnings, Jorgensen has become a prominent figure in the steer wrestling arena. As he continues to compete and strive for success, his story serves as an inspiration to aspiring rodeo athletes and fans alike.
